Apoya a Rosalba y haz que su taller sea más prospero con un Préstamo.
texts.en:
Rosalba is a 61-year-old woman. Initially she worked in the sewing business as a machine operator for three years. After passing this period of time, she started her own workshop.

She lives alone and is a widow. For five years she has been an independent woman, and thanks to the micro loans, she has the possibility of being her own boss since her sewing studio is recognized for its good customer service. She is requesting a loan to buy two sewing machines because she wants to increase her production capacity and create jobs.

Help Rosalba to make her workshop more prosperous with a loan.

loans.use: to buy two sewing machines in order to increase production.

loans.name: Oscar

texts.es: Oscar is single he doesn t have children and he lives in La Paz but he is forced to work at El Alto because of the money Oscar is a driver and he needs a loan to buy a new engine for his vehicle he recently had a car crash he is fine but the vehicle is useless and that is not good for him because he doesnt know what else he can do to make some money Oscar hopes you can trust him again.
texts.en:
Oscar is single, doesn't have children, and he lives in La Paz, but he is forced to work at El Alto because of the money.

Oscar is a driver and he needs a loan to buy a new engine for his vehicle. He recently had a car crash. He is fine, but the vehicle is useless, and that is not good for him, because he doesn't know what else he can do to make some money.

Oscar hopes you can trust him with a loan.

loans.use: to buy a new engine for his vehicle

loans.name: Lorena Alejandra

texts.es:
Lorena, con 21 años de edad es madre de 1 hija de 17 meses y es soltera.

Actualmente se dedica a la venta de mercancía y productos por catálogo, ofrece cosméticos, accesorios, ropa, perfumes, entre otros y con esto ha logrado obtener recursos para aportar al sostenimiento de su hogar durante los 2 años que lleva realizando dicha actividad. 

Es una mujer emprendedora, con visión, dedicada y comprometida con su familia y su trabajo, siempre busca oportunidades que le permitan progresar, por esa razón solicita el crédito, con el fin de invertirlo en la compra de mercancía al por mayor (perfumería, cremas corporales, cosméticos, shampoo, tratamientos capilares) para aprovechar los descuentos que le realizan y ofrecer más variedad que satisfaga los gustos y necesidades de sus clientes y así poder tener mejor margen de utilidad por las ventas. 

De esta manera, Lorena podrá avanzar hacia el cumplimiento de su objetivo primordial, que es ampliar su negocio y mejorar la calidad de vida de su pequeña hija, brindándole una estabilidad económica favorable.
texts.en:
Lorena is 21 years old and the single mother of a 17 month old daughter.

She sells merchandise and products, such as cosmetics, accessories, clothing, perfumes, and other things via catalog.  This has allowed her to obtain the resources she needs to support her household and he has been doing this for two years.

She is an enterprising, dedicated woman with a vision and who is committed to her family.  She is always looking for opportunities that allow her to move ahead.  She is asking for this loan to buy merchandise in quantity (perfumes, body creams, cosmetics, shampoo, and capillary treatments) so she can take advantage of discounts and be able to offer a greater variety of merchandise to satisfy her customers’ preferences and needs.  This way she will be able to improve her sales margins.

Lorena will be able to move forward on her main goal of expanding her business, improving her daughter’s quality of life, and provide her financial stability.

loans.use: to buy inventory.

loans.name: Catherine

texts.en:
Catherine is in her late 30s and is a widow and mother of three children who are still at school.  She has been running a business selling electronic money transfers, m-pesa, tigo pesa, and airtel money for four years now.  She works from 07am to 07pm daily and is able to make a good monthly profit.  

This will be her 20th loan from Tujijenge Tanzania.  She used the previous loans to increase services for her electronic money transfer business and has paid back all her loans successfully.   

Catherine is really doing great and appreciates Kiva for the support of their group which is doing wonders with their loan. She used the profits from her past loans to pay school fees, saved some money in her bank account, and covered household expenses.  She will use this loan to increase her services: electronic money transfers, tigopesa, m-pesa, airtel money, and to open another shop for the same business.  She dreams of becoming an international business woman.

She will make sure she pays back her loan at the scheduled period

loans.use: to increase services of electronic money transfers, tigo pesa, m-pesa, airtel money, and to open another shop for the same business

loans.name: Andrew

texts.en:
Andrew is a hardworking married man living in Kamwenge Uganda. He is a livestock farmer. With this, he has been able to sustain his family. 

He hopes to buy more land and develop his farm, though his main challenge is bad weather conditions especially prolonged droughts leading to lack of water and pastures for his animals.

He is requesting a loan to buy baby cattle to add to his farm.

loans.use: to buy calves for his farm

loans.name: Juliana's Group

texts.en:
Juliana is 56 years old and has 9 children. She is a group leader and is representing her group formed by 16 farmers in Matete District, Kenya. 

Juliana has been farming with One Acre Fund for years now, having joined the program for the first time in 2011. This decision was largely a result of her desire to earn enough to feed her family.   Although she described her last harvest as excellent, she believes she could have a better one this year by continuing to work alongside One Acre Fund. Juliana also decided to purchase a solar light as part of her loan, which she is very excited about, as it will allow her to have an overall improved quality of life.

Obtaining this loan means that Juliana's Group will be able to receive a total of 9 solar lights, as well as farming inputs to plant a total of 10 acres.

loans.use: to purchase a solar light and gain access to cost efficient hybrid seeds and fertilizer for maize cultivation

loans.name: Maria Mercedes

texts.es:
Guiada por un impulsa y corazonada a comienzos del año 2010 la señora María inicio con un negocio de cría de peces el cual surgió por necesidad económica buscando alimentar su familia y pagar las cuentas que comúnmente se presenta en un hogar.

María vive junto con su pareja con la cual tienen dos hijos una de 14 y otro de 8, sus hijos representan todo, inicio el negocio pensando en el futuro de ellos, que tuvieran estudio, alimento y vivienda digna, han pasado 5 años y sigue en pie en su negocio mejorando cada día, aprendiendo de la profesión, ella misma rebusca sus clientes, no queda quieta esperando, sale en busca de quien pueda comprar sus peces, de consejos para para mejorar, en resumen pone mucho empeño en sacar su negocio adelante, tiene un compromiso no solo con sus hijos, ella quiere mejorar la situación económica de su hogar.

María quiere solicitar un préstamo para la compra de alimento para pescado, adecuación de los pozos e iniciara con la construir de un pozo nuevo el cual ira abasteciendo poco a poco, conforme su negocio muestre resultados.
texts.en:
Guided by impulse and a hunch, at the beginning of the year 2010 María started a business raising fish. The idea came from economic necessity as she needed to feed her family and pay the bills that often arrive at her house. 
María lives with her partner with whom she has 2 children who are 14 and 8 years old. Her children are everything to her and she started the business with their future in mind so that they could study, eat and live with dignity. 5 years have passed and she continues to run her business, improving it every day and learning all the time. 
She goes in search of customers rather than sitting waiting for them to come to her. She seeks out people who can buy her fish. She is always looking for  tips on how to improve. In short, she puts a lot of effort into making her business successful. She is committed not only to her children, but also wants to improve the household's economic situation. 
María wants to request a loan to buy fish food, to maintain wells, and to begin constructing a new well which will supply water little by little, and her business will show results.

loans.use: to buy fish food, to maintain wells, and to construct a new well.

loans.name: Waldiris De Jesus

texts.es:
Waldiris una persona emprendedora desde siempre, quien ha emprendido varios negocios con el fin de encontrar una sostenibilidad económica y sobre todo poder dedicar su tiempo a sus 2 hijos, está incursionando en el mundo de la belleza con sus servicios a domicilios de cepillado, maquillaje, arreglo de uñas, etc. Con el cual ha generado ingresos para sostener su hogar.

Espera crecer mucho más su negocio, en un futuro poder tener su propio local de belleza y posicionarse en el mercado de un forma segura.

Su dificultad más grande es la falta de capital.

El crédito será utilizado para adquirir los muebles, equipos y productos de belleza (maquillaje, plancha, sprays, cremas de peinar, etc.) con los que podrá ofrecer un servicio de mejor calidad.
texts.en:
Waldiris has always been an enterprising person who has undertaken various businesses with the goal of achieving financial sustainability and, above all, to be able to dedicate her time to her 2 children. She is moving into the world of beauty offering home services for hair styling, make-up, manicure, etc. Doing this, she has generate income to support her home.
She hopes to grow her business much more in the future so that she can have her own beauty salon and securely position herself in the market.
Her greatest difficulty is a lack of capital.
She will use the loan to buy furniture, equipment, and beauty products (make-up, hair irons, sprays, skin creams, etc) with which she will be able to offer a better quality service.

loans.use: to buy furniture, hair irons, equipment, and beauty products (make-up, sprays, skin cream, etc.)

loans.name: Edgar Manuel

texts.es:
Desde tempranas horas de la madrugada se ve al señor Edgar trabajando en sus cultivos de plátanos, procurando despertar cada mañana con el mejor ánimo e ímpetu para hacer bien las cosas, Edgar quiere tener un mejor futuro para sus hijos, que su calidad de vida aumente, ampliar sus cultivos, inculcarle el valor del campo a sus hijos, que estos amen este trabajo y en algún momento lo desempeñe, todos estos deseos de una humilde persona que se levanta cada mañana con el claro propósito de progresar.

Edgar quiere solicitar un préstamo para comprar unas mallas para proteger sus plátanos de diferentes depredadores, también quiere cercar sus terrenos, y el resto lo invertirá en la compra de abonos y semillas.
texts.en:
In the early hours of the morning Edgar goes to work in his banana fields, trying to wake each morning with the best attitude and energy to do his work well.  Edgar wants to have a better future for his children, to improve his quality of life, increase his crop, instill the value of farmwork in his children, and for them to love this work.  He is currently working towards these goals.  They are the desires of a humble person who awakes each morning with the clear objective of progressing in life.

Edgar wants to request a loan to buy a fence to protect his bananas from various predators, and also wants to fence in his land.  The rest he will use to buy  fertilizer and seeds.

loans.use: to buy a fence to protect his banana crops, as well as seeds and fertilizer.

loans.name: Diana Maria

texts.es:
Diana es una persona muy trabajadora que gracias a su esfuerzo diario ha logrado sacar adelante a su hijo brindándole una educación de buena calidad.

Diana vive en unión libre con su pareja y desde hace mucho tiempo comenzó a vender productos de uso personal a través de catalogo, con gran esfuerzo a superado muchos problemas que se le han presentado.

Actualmente Diana tiene unos muy buenos pedidos por parte de sus clientes y debido a que no cuenta con un gran capital busca un préstamo para comprar productos de uso personal y responder a los grandes pedidos que tiene de sus clientes.
Le dedica 4 horas diarias a su negocio.

Su mayor sueño es salir adelante con su negocio y desde este poder ofrecerles a su hijo una buena calidad de vida y una mejor estabilidad económica, sabe que de la mano de Interactuar podrá lograrlo.
texts.en:
Diana is a hard-working person and thanks to her daily effort she has been able to move her child ahead by providing a good quality education. Diana is in a common-law marriage with her partner, and a long time ago she began selling personal products out of catalogs. With great effort she has overcome many problems that have presented themselves.

Currently Diana has very good orders from her customers, and because she does not have a lot of capital, she is requesting a loan to buy personal use products to fulfill the many orders that she has from her customers.

She dedicates four hours each day to her business. Her greatest dream is to move her business ahead, and from there be able to offer her child a good quality of life and greater financial stability. She knows that with the help of Interactuar she can achieve it.

loans.use: to buy personal use products to fulfill the many orders that she has from her customers.

loans.name: Parveen

texts.en:
Parveen is a 48-year-old married woman.  She deals in a business selling animals. She buys animals (baby goats & calves) at low prices, raises them and then sells them out in the market at higher prices. She makes enough through her business to contribute to the family income. She also sells milk to generate an extra amount of income. 

She needs to improve her business to bear her household expenses. For this reason, she contacted Kashf Foundation and applied a loan of 50,000 PKR to purchase more animals to increase her sales. She is very experienced and has good contacts in the market. With this loan, she will definitely expand her business and income level.

loans.use: to purchase more animals to increase her sales

loans.name: Jetrida

texts.en:
Jetrida is a 27-year-old married woman, and mother of two children living in Kasese, Uganda. For fifteen years Jetrida has been making sweaters, from which she makes profits and earns a living. 

She is a hardworking woman who dreams of expanding her business and creating jobs for others, plus educating her children. 

She is faced with the challenge of limited capital and seasonal customers, because her sales are high during the school terms.  

She tries her best to make good quality products to fit the available market. 

Jetrida needs a loan to buy more threads to make sweaters to sell.

loans.use: to buy more thread to make sweaters to sell

loans.name: Hudaa

texts.en:
Hudaa is a married woman and mother of one child.  Her child does not attend school. She owns a house that has electricity and piped water.

She has operated a retail shop business for the past six months, selling household consumables like wheat flour, maize flour, and sugar. She faces a major challenge of competition from other vendors in her place of operation.

With the loan she is requesting, she wants to purchase sugar, rice, maize flour, and wheat flour. 

She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase sugar, rice, maize flour, and wheat flour

loans.name: Cecilia Del Socorro

texts.es:
Ella es Cecilia es una mujer sería, focalizada, ha superado ciertas dificultades en su vida, una de ellas fue separarse de su esposo, en un principio fue difícil debido a que siempre se había desempeñado como ama de casa, no trabajaba, pero tenía que ingeniarse algún método para conseguir su sustento y el de su hijo que hoy tiene 25 años de edad.

La falta de experiencia fue un agravante de su situación y era razonable que una empresa no contratara a una persona de su edad que no tenía experiencia laboral, se encontraba sin que hacer y opto por su última oportunidad, aprovecho su conocimiento empírico en cocina e inicio con la venta de almuerzos y fiambres, empanadas, pasteles de pollo, buñuelos, arepa con carne, entre otros. Para las personas que no están relacionadas con el término un fiambre es un almuerzo envuelto en una hoja de plátano, esto le da propiedades y un sabor muy especial.
 
Inicio en el año 2013 y ha ido encontrando en esta actividad una forma de generar el sustento para su mantenimiento y el de su hijo.

Cecilia por la falta de capital no ha podido sacar su negocio adelante, por ello quiere solicitar un préstamo para invertir en la compra de una vitrina para exhibir sus productos, compra de insumos para prepararlos (hoja de plátano, carne, papas, yuca, arroz, aceite de cocina, sal, azúcar, frutas, plátano, frijoles, guisantes, entre otros).
texts.en:
Cecilia is a serious, focused woman who has overcome certain difficulties in her life. One of those was separating from her husband. It was difficult at first as she had always worked as a housewife, not working outside the home. But, she had to find some way to support herself and her son who is now 25 years old. 
The lack of experience aggravated her situation and it was understandable that companies did not want to take on a person of her age who did not have work experience. She found herself without work and took her last chance - taking advantage of her experience in the kitchen, she started selling lunches including fiambres, empanadas, chicken pies, fritters, meat-stuffed arepas, and other items. (For those who aren't familiar with the terminology, a fiambre is a lunch dish wrapped in a banana leaf which gives it special properties and flavor.)
She began in the year 2013 and has found this to be a way to generate income to sustain herself and her son. 
Because of a lack of capital, Cecilia has not been able to grow he business, so she is requesting a loan to buy a counter to exhibit her products and to buy supplies to make them (including banana leaves, meat, potatoes, yuca, rice, cooking oil, salt, sugar, fruits, plantain, beans, peas, and other things.)

loans.use: to buy supplies to prepare food (banana leaves, meat, potatoes, yuca, rice, cooking oil, salt, sugar, fruits, plantain, beans, peas, and other things.)

loans.name: Maicol Mauricio

texts.es:
Maicol es un hombre soltero de 20 años de edad, se dedica al comercio de productos para el hogar como víveres y abarrotes, está actividad que inicio en el año 2014, cansado de estar desempleado, y buscando una forma de sustento, en pocas palabras Maicol es un hombre que sin quejarse, solo con compromiso, dedicación y hambre de progreso monto un negocio que aspira a transformar en una tienda general de productos de la canasta familiar.

Maicol es dedicado trabaja diariamente las horas que tenga pro laborar, normalmente son 8 diarias, busca primero tener una sostenibilidad de su negocio, adquirir mayor número de clientes, buscar en otras zonas cercanas en donde entregar mercancía sea viable, esto por temas más de costo de envió.

Todo este esfuerzo los une en un único propósito que es mejorar la calidad de vida de su hogar.
Maicol quiere solicitar un préstamo para la compra de surtido de víveres y abarrotes en cantidades busca tener convenios y alianzas estratégicas con diferentes proveedores cercanos a su pueblo.
texts.en:
Maicol is a single man, 20 years old. He works selling products for the house, such as food and groceries. He began doing this in the year 2014, tired of being unemployed and searching for a way to support himself.  To say a few words, Maicol is a man who, without complaining, but with commitment, dedication, and a hunger for progress, started a business which he aspires to transform into a general store selling staple products.

Maicol is dedicated, working daily the hours he must, which is normally 8 hours a day. He is primarily seeking stability for his business, to get more clients, which he is looking for in nearby areas where it will be viable to deliver merchandise, due mainly to issues of shipping costs. 

He unites all these efforts for one purpose, which is to improve the quality of life of his home. Maicol wants to request a loan to buy a variety of supplies and provisions in large quantities. He is looking for agreements and strategic alliances with different suppliers near his town.

loans.use: to buy a variety of supplies and provisions to sell wholesale

loans.name: Nadia

texts.es:
Nadia es una humilde trabajadora residente en el municipio de Turbo con una vida colmada de sueños, esperanzas y los mejores deseos para su familia. 

Es madre de 2 hijos por los cuales siempre tuvo el valor y responsabilidad de responder para que su vida fuera la mejor.

Hoy en día se gana la vida con la venta de frutas a alimentos los transporta en una carretilla y los vende de manera ambulante.
Le dedica 5 horas diarias a su negocio.

De las principales dificultades que debe enfrentar en su trabajo son las fuertes lluvias y el alto costo de las materias primas.

Solicita un préstamo para la compra de una carretilla nueva para reemplazar la que actualmente tiene en mal estado y no le permite trabajar bien.

Con tu ayuda, Nadia podrá tener su negocio en mejores condiciones y podrá trabajar de una manera mas comoda.
texts.en:
Nadia is a humble worker who lives in the municipality of Turbo with a life full of dreams, hopes, and wishes for the best for her family.

She is the mother of two children whom she has always had the courage and responsibility to care for so that their lives could be better.  

She currently makes her living selling fruits and foods; she transports them in a wheelbarrow and sells them on foot. 

She spends five hours a day working. 

The main challenges she faces in her work are strong rains and the high cost of the raw materials. 

She is requesting a loan to buy a new wheelbarrow to replace the one she currently has, which is in bad shape and does not allow her to work well. 

With your help, Nadia will be able to get her business in better shape and work more comfortably.

loans.use: to buy a new wheelbarrow to replace the one she currently has

loans.name: Razia

texts.en:
Razia is a 55-year-old widow. She has been in the business of running a beauty parlor for many years, along with her daughter who is also shown in the photo. She offers many facilities to her customers such as makeup, hair styling and facials. 

Over time she has attained a regular list of customers and makes enough to contribute in the family income. She needs to deal with more customers time after time. That is why she has applied a loan of 50,000 PKR through Kashf Foundation. It will allow her to purchase combs, a hair straightener, makeup kits, and cleansers for treating many customers at a time, to earn more revenue for running her household activities efficiently. She is very experienced in her business and confident that her business will move toward a positive direction as a result of the loan investment.

loans.use: to purchase combs, a hair straightener, makeup kits, and cleansers for treating many customers at a time, to earn more revenue for running her household activities efficiently.

loans.name: Jorge William

texts.es:
Jorge de 39 años, es separado y tiene dos hijos, desde hace 15 años tiene una tienda de abarrotes.

Tiene como sueño ampliar su tienda donde distribuye artículos como leche, granos, verduras, lácteos y otros. 

En la actualidad tiene poco espacio y esto es perjudicial ya que no puede acomodar todos sus productos.


Jorge, en vista de esto, optó en solicitar un préstamo con el fin de organizarse más y poder ampliar su local,  esto le representaría también el aumento en sus ingresos para cumplir necesidades básicas de todo negocio como son los servicios públicos, impuestos, y demás; mejorara también el bienestar de él y el de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Jorge is 39 years old. He is separated and has two children. For the last 15 years he has owned a grocery store. He has a dream to expand his store where he distributes items such as milk, grains, vegetables, dairy, and other items. He currently has little space, and this is detrimental since he cannot accommodate all of his products.

With this in mind, Jorge decided to request a loan with the end goal of getting more organized and expanding his store. This would also represent an increase in his income in order to fulfill the basic necessities such as utilities, taxes and other items. It will also improve the well-being for him and his children.

loans.use: to expand his store with some location reforms.

loans.name: Margarita Marlene

texts.es:
La venta de frutas y verduras, es la actividad en la cual se desempeña Margarita, una mujer con empuje y perseverancia para sacar adelante su propio negocio y a su familia.

Ella se dedica a esta actividad desde hace más de 10 años trabajando desde muy temprano en la mañana todos los días para ofrecer sus alimentos.
Trabaja con un familiar (Ver Fotos) todos los días durante 5 horas.

Decidió iniciar este proyecto al ver la necesidad de obtener más ingresos para su familia y ya que no tenía la educación suficiente para otro cargo, opto por la venta de verduras.

Es una mujer simpática y servicial, siempre dispuesta a atender las inquietudes y deseos de sus clientes.

Ella pide un auxilio económico con la Corporación Interactuar para comprar una un amplio surtido de plátano y de esta manera abastecerse y vender una mayor cantidad de alimentos.

Su sueño es tener un local en cual pueda vender tranquila y cómodamente sus alimentos.

Presta y aporta hoy, anímate!
texts.en:
Selling fruits and vegetables is Margarita's business; she is a woman with drive and the resolve to get her business and family ahead.  

She has had this business for over 10 years, working from very early in the morning every day to offer her produce.  

She works with a relative (see photos) every day for five hours. 

She decided to start this project when she realized she needed more income for her family and, as she did not have enough education for other work, she decided to sell vegetables. 

She is a kind and helpful woman who is always ready to handle her customers' concerns and demands. 

She is asking for financial help from Corporación Interactuar to buy a large supply of bananas and thereby stock up and sell a larger amount of produce. 

Her dream is to have a stall where she could sell her produce easily and comfortably.  

Lend and support today, go for it!

loans.use: to buy a large supply of bananas and thereby stock up and sell a larger amount of produce.

loans.name: Solangi Group

texts.es: Tres mujeres luchadoras, emprendedoras y deseosas de salir adelante conforman el grupo “Solangi”. Su coordinadora, María de 57 años,  se dedica a la venta de frutas y verduras desde hace 20 años, iniciándose con el financiamiento de microempresas. Solicitan crédito por 8va. Ocasión para la compra de nuevos productos como tamarindo, mango, jocotes y ayotes. Recolectando sus ganancias desea el poder pagar deudas y seguir mejorando su casa. Liset de 47 años tiene su negocio de venta de ropa nueva para adultos y niños en el mercado local de Masaya, ella necesita el préstamo para la compra de camisa, falda, tobilleras, pijamas y ropa interior. Cinthia de 26 años vende frutas y verduras y desea comprar mercadería como quequisque, yuca, naranja, melón.
texts.en: Three determined, entrepreneurial women who want to get ahead make up the Solangi group.  Their coordinator, 57-year-old María, has been selling fruits and vegetables for 20 years, after having started out with a small business loan.  They are requesting their 8th loan to buy new produce, such as tamarind, mangos, jocote, and pumpkins.  After gathering her earnings, she wants to be able to repay her debts and continue work on her house.  Liset, who is 47 years old, has a business selling new clothing for adults and children at the local market in Masaya; she needs a loan to buy tops, skirts, ankle socks, pajamas, and underwear.  Cinthya, who is 26 years old, sells fruits and vegetables and wants to buy merchandise, such as taro, yucca, oranges, and melons.

loans.use: to buy new produce, such as tamarind, mangos, jocote, and pumpkins.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase clothing

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase farm products

loans.name: Chynarbubu

texts.ru: Чынарбубу, 50 лет, замужем, есть 2 детей. У Чынарбубу среднее образование, с 1995 года она начала бизнес по разведению скота и полеводству. На сегодняшний день в хозяйстве есть 3 коровы, 50 овец. На участке мерою 2,59 Га она выращивает фасоль для реализации. Совокупный среднемесячный доход составляет около 10,000 сом (KGS). Сельское хозяйство - хороший источник дохода, Чынарбубу обратилась в Банк «Бай-Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 150,000 сом (KGS) на покупку коровы и 10 овец. Доходы от кредита позволят Чынарбубу развить бизнес и улучшить благосостояние ее семьи.
texts.en: Chynarbubu is 50 years old, married, and has 2 children.  Chynarbubu has a secondary education.  In 1995, she started a business raising livestock and growing crops.  She now owns 3 cows and 50 sheep, as well as a 2.59 hectare plot of land on which she raises beans to sell.  Her overall monthly income is about 10,000 KGS.  Agriculture is a good source of income.  Chynarbubu turned to the bank "Bai-Tushum" for a loan of 150,000 KGS to purchase a cow and 10 sheep.  The income from the loan will allow Chynarbubu to expand her business and improve her family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy one cow and 10 sheep in order to increase the size of her herd

loans.name: Anar

texts.ru: Анар, 46 лет, замужем. На протяжении 16 лет занимается животноводством и полеводством. У Анар среднее образование. В хозяйстве имеет корову, 10 овец. Также есть земельный надел, 1,92 ГА собственной земли, где она выращивает фасоль для реализации. Совокупная прибыль Анар составляет около 10,000 сом (KGS). Она является участником группы "Келечек Озгоруш", в которой кроме нее состоят еще 2 человека, всего их 3. Анар обратилась в Банк «Бай-Тушум» за кредитом, в сумме 25,000 сом (KGS) на покупку удобрений, семян фасоли, что позволит ей развить бизнес и увеличить доходы семьи.
texts.en: Anar is 46 years old and married.  For 16 years she has worked in animal husbandry and agriculture.  Anar has a secondary education.  She owns a cow and 10 sheep and also has a 1.92 hectare plot of her own land, on which she raises beans for resale.  In total, her income is about 10,000 KGS.  She is a member of the group "Kelecheck Ozgorush," of which there are two other members.  Anar turned to the bank "Bai-Tushum" for a loan of 25,000 KGS to purchase fertilizer and bean seeds to allow her to expand her business and improve her family's income.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, fuel and seeds to grow organic beans

loans.name: Aidai

texts.ru: Айдай, 44 года, замужем, мама 2 детей школьного возраста. У нее высшее образование, в качестве источника дохода для семьи Айдай 5 лет назад начала заниматься сельским хозяйством. Начатый со стартовой суммы в 9,000 сом (KGS), на сегодня в хозяйстве есть 9 коров, 50 овец. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Айдай обратилась в Банк «Бай – Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 22,000 сом (KGS) на покупку скота для откорма. Доходы от кредита она планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие ее бизнеса.
texts.en: Aidai is 44 years old, married, and the mother of 2 school-aged children.  She has a higher education.  Aidai's working agriculture, which began 5 years ago with a sum of 9,000 KGS, is the primary source of income for her family.  She now owns 9 cows and 50 sheep.  With the goal of further expanding her business, Aidai turned to the bank "Bai-Tushum" for a loan of 22,000 KGS to purchase cattle for fattening.  With the income from the loan, she plans to continue investing in the development of her business.

loans.use: to buy additional livestock in order to increase the size of her herd

loans.name: Carmen Guadalupe

texts.es:
Carmen, de 26 años de edad, estudio hasta sexto grado, está casada y su pareja se dedica a la agricultura y además presta sus servicios como seguridad, tiene 3 hijos, los cuales están estudiando, su madre vive con ella desde hace mucho tiempo. 

Carmen, se dedica a los oficios domésticos y a cultivar la tierra, ella es la mano derecha de su esposo en el cultivo de maíz, frijol y maicillo.- Se ha dedicado a esta actividad desde que se casó y el horario en el que lo realiza es aproximadamente de 5 horas al día.  

Ella necesita el crédito para comprar dos vacas lecheras, para aprovechar los residuos de la cosecha de maíz.- Este préstamo le ayudará a mejorar sus condiciones de vida. 

Los sueños son, seguir trabajando de la mano con su esposo, sueña con ver a sus hijos adultos y preparados académicamente, para que tengan una vida digna.
texts.en:
Carmen, who is 26 years old, has a sixth-grade education, is married, and her husband works in farming and also works in security.  She has three children who are in school; her mother has lived with her for a long time. 

Carmen is a homemaker and she also farms; she is her husband's right hand in planting corn, beans, and sorghum.  She has done this work since she got married and her work schedule is about five hours a day.  

She needs this loan to buy dairy cows to take advantage of what is left over from their corn harvest.  This loan will help her improver her living conditions. 

Her dreams are to keep working together with her husband; she dreams of seeing her children as adults who are academically prepared so they can have a respectable life.

loans.use: to buy two diary cows

loans.name: Naseem

texts.en:
Naseem is a 41-year-old married woman. She is a very dedicated mother of six children. She has been running a business of making and selling woolen products such as hand-made sweaters, caps etc. She has been supporting her family with the help of income from this business. 

She has requested a loan amount of 55,000 PKR. She wants to purchase spools of wool and yarn, along with packs of needles. This will allow her to meet the demands of her customers consistently and fulfill her dream of giving her children the best education and health facilities that she can afford.

loans.use: to purchase spools of wool and yarn, along with packs of needles for meeting the demands of her customers consistently.

loans.name: Martha Lilian

texts.es:
Martha es una mujer muy entregada a su trabajo pues a sus 46 años de edad trabaja incasablemente todos los días de la semana de lunes a domingo en su negocio de producción de alimentos típicos como tamales. 

Madre de 2 hijos que dependen totalmente de ella ve una oportunidad de una entidad que le brinda la confianza de tener un crédito para mejorar su negocio y soñar con su fábrica de producción de alimentos y hacerle creer que es posible alcanzar este sueño. 

Le dedica 6 horas diarias a su negocio.

Solicita un crédito para la compra de insumos como carne, vegetales, harina, entre otros. 
Con la ayuda de este crédito la señora Martha producirá mas alimentos y le permitirá obtener mejores ingresos para cada día darle mejores oportunidades de vida a sus dos hijos
texts.en:
Martha is a woman who is very committed to her work. At 46 years old she works tirelessly every day of the week from Monday to Sunday in her business making local food such as tamales. 
She is the mother of 2 children who are totally dependent on her. She saw an opportunity offered by an organization that gave her the confidence to take out a loan to improve her business and to dream of having a food production business and to believe that it was possible to achieve this dream.
She works on her business 6 hours a day.
She is requesting a loan to buy supplies such as meat, vegetables, flour, and other things. 
With the help of this loan, Martha will be able to make more food and this will enable her to have more income so that she can offer more opportunities to her children every day.

loans.use: compra de insumos como carne, vegetales, harina, entre otros.

loans.name: Sakwendé Group

texts.fr: Safiatta est la responsable du groupe Sakwendé. Elle est marié et mère de 4 enfants. Elle vend du savon et des pagnes. Safiatta a besoin de ce crédit pour acheter du savon traditionnel communément appelé cabakourou au Burkina, qui est très utilisé par les ménages pour faire la vaisselle et aussi des pagnes pour vendre. cette femme battante fait cette activité depuis 7 ans. Pour réussir son commerce, elle se déplace à l'aide de sa moto pour livrer sa marchandise. A l'issue de ses ventes, hormis ses dépenses de fonctionnements , elle pourra faire un bénéfice qui lui permettra de continuer son activité et de s'occuper de sa famille.
texts.en:
Safiatta is the official of the group Sakwendé and is the married mother of four. She sells soap and 'pagnes' (the colorful cloth of western Africa). She has need of this loan to purchase some traditional soap commonly called “cabakourou” in Burkina (the soap is used a lot for washing dishes); and some ‘pagne’ cloth to sell. 

A determined woman, Safiatta has been in this business for seven years. To succeed in her commerce, she make trips using her motorbike and delivers her merchandise. After her sales and beyond her operating expenses, she will be able to make a profit enabling her to continue in her business and to take care of her family.

loans.use: to purchase 'pagne' cloth and some soap to sell

loans.name: Soro

texts.ru: Это Соро. Ей 47 лет. Она замужем и мать двоих детей. У нее один сын и одна дочка. Сыну 10 лет. Дочку 18 лет. Сын учится в средней школе, а дочка учится в университете. Соро занимается купля продажей молодых телят. Она выращивает молодых телят у себя во дворе более 7 лет. Ей в работе помогает сын. Соро планирует расширить деятельность. Она просит кредит, чтобы купит несколько молодых телят для  откорма и продажи. Запрашиваемый кредит поможет ей  расширить деятельность и увеличить доход.
texts.en: This is Soro.  She is 47 years old, married, and the mother of two children.  She has one son and one daughter; her son is 10 years old and her daughter is 18.  Her son is studying in secondary school and her daughter is in college.  Soro buys and resells young calves, and has been raising young calves at her home for more than 7 years.  Her son helps her with her work.  Soro is planning to expand her business, and is asking for a loan to purchase several young calves to fatten and sell.  The loan will allow her to expand her business and increase her income.

loans.use: to purchase several young calves and to expand her business

loans.name: Mistekan

texts.ru: Мистекан, 49 лет, замужем, мать 4 детей. У Мистекан среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи она занимается животноводством. Благодаря упорному труду Мистекан, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 2 коровы, 20 овец. На 1,50 Га земли выращивает фасоль для реализации. Мистекан в целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 30,000 сом (KGS) на покупку овец и корма для скота. Доходы от кредита она планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины.
texts.en: Mistekan is 49 years old, married, and the mother of 4 children.  Mistekan has a secondary education.  Her work in animal husbandry serves as the primary source of income for her family.  Thanks to Mistekan's hard work, she now owns 2 cows, 20 sheep, and a 1.50 hectare plot of land on which she raises beans to sell.  With the goal of further expanding her business, Mistekan turned to the bank "Bai-Tushum" for a loan of 30,000 KGS to purchase sheep and feed for her cattle.  With the income from the loan she plans to save toward further increasing the size of her herd.

loans.use: to buy feed for livestock and sheep to fatten and resell

loans.name: Carlos Arturo

texts.es:
Carlos, un hombre de 65 años de edad llena de sueños y aspiraciones en su vida, vive en una finca en el municipio de La Dorada y se gana la vida con la producción y venta de pollos y huevos.  

Con este trabajo intenta sostener a su familia compuesta por su esposa y 2 hijos.
Es un trabajo que ha venido ejerciendo desde hace aproximadamente 3 años con el fin de salir adelante.

Pide un apoyo económico para la compra de pollos, gallinas ponedoras, alimento y materiales para su galpón.

Con este préstamo podrá tener un negocio más sostenible y consolidado.

Con un préstamo que hagas hoy podrás mejorar la vida y el negocio de Carlos!
texts.en:
Carlos, a 65-year-old man, full of dreams and life's aspirations, lives on a small farm in the municipallity of La Dorada and earns his living through the production and sale of chickens and eggs.

With this work, he is attempting to sustain his family, which is composed of his wife and two children. It's work he has been doing for approximately three years with the purpose of forging ahead.

Carlos is requesting economic aid to purchase chickens, egg-laying hens, chicken feed and materials for rebuilding his chicken coop. With this loan he will be able to consolidate his business and make it more sustainable. In fact, with the loan he is taking out today, Carlos will be able to improve both his life and his business.

loans.use: buy chickens, hens, egg-layers, chicken feed, and materials to improve his chicken coop.

loans.name: Scovia

texts.en:
Scovia is a hard-working widow with four children living in Kamwenge, Uganda. She operates a retail shop for her survival and also practises farming to earn more income to support her family. She faces the challenge of defaulters who buy from her shop on credit.

Scovia needs to take out a loan to buy soap and sugar to sell. Her vision is to expand her business into wholesale and to educate all her children.

loans.use: to buy soap and sugar to sell.

loans.name: Suluukan

texts.ru: Сулуукан 56 лет, замужем, воспитала 2 детей.  Она на пенсии, в качестве источника дохода для своей семьи, занимается разведением скота и полеводством, начав этот бизнес в 1995 году. Благодаря упорному труду на сегодняшний день, Сулуукан имеет в хозяйстве 4 коровы, 50 овец, 4 лошади. На ежедневной основе продает молоко. На 3,0 Га земли выращивает фасоль. Деятельность приносит ежемесячную прибыль в сумме 20,000 сом. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Сулуукан обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку 25 овец. Доходы от кредита Сулуукан планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение хозяйства.
texts.en: Suluukan is 56 years old, married, and raised 2 children.  She is retired, but as a source of income for her family, has been working in agriculture and livestock since 1995.  Thanks to her hard work, Suluukan now owns 4 cows, 50 sheep, and 4 horses.  She sells milk every day and also raises beans on a 3.0 hectare plot of land.  These endeavors provide a monthly income of about 20,000 KGS.  With the goal of further expanding her business, Suluukan turned to the bank "Bai-Tushum" for a loan of 100,000 KGS to purchase 25 sheep.  With the income from the loan Suluukan plans to save toward the further growth of her business.

loans.use: to buy 25 sheep to fatten and resell

loans.name: Amalia

texts.es:
Amalia una adorable persona de 62 años de edad, con espíritu y ganas de trabajar, ella tiene un negocio, una “chaza”, un puesto de trabajo que creó teniendo un terreno, cercándolo y protegiéndolo con una carpa, donde tiene ubicado congeladores y vitrinas que es donde se exhiben sus productos tal y como se observa en la foto.

Ella es una mujer que vive y lucha por lo suyo, se separó de su esposo, no tiene hijos, solo su negocio que un día de 1999 inicio con la esperanza de que se convirtiera en su sustento y su medio de progreso y hasta el día de hoy ha cumplido su tarea.

Amalia quiere solicitar un préstamo para abastecer su negocio, comprara bebidas principalmente, parte del monto será destinado a la cancelación de un préstamo que tiene vigente.
texts.en:
Amaila is 62 years old and she has a “chaza,” a work location she created on a piece of land that she fenced in and protected it with a tent.  There she has freezers and display cases where she shows her products as shown in the photo.

She is a woman who lives and strives for what’s hers.  She separated from her husband and doesn’t have any children, only her business that she began in 1999 with the hopes of it becoming a means of support and progress for her.  This task became a reality.

Amalia is asking for a loan to stock her business.  She will buy mainly beverages and will use part of the money to pay off another debt.

loans.use: to stock her business.

loans.name: Wendinso Group

texts.fr: Fatimata, membre représentatif est marié et mère de 3 enfants.Cette jeune dame âgée de 33 ans fait le commerce des pagnes et des vêtements pour enfant depuis 2004, soit 11 ans déjà. Fatimata et les autres dames sont à leur 4ème contrat de prêt avec ACFIME, mais jusque là, les remboursements se font normalement. Fatimata a besoin de ce crédit pour acheter les pagnes et les vêtements et vendre au prix en gros. Elle a ses clients qui viennent se ravitailler auprès d'elle pour revendre en détaille. Après ses ventes, Fatimata aura un bénéfice qui lui permettra de renforcer son commerce mais aussi de s'occuper de ses enfants.
texts.en:
Fatimata, a representative member, is a married mother of three. This young lady, aged 33, has been doing commerce in 'pagnes' (the colorful cloth of western Africa) and in children’s clothing since 2004, about eleven years already. She and the other ladies are on their 4th loan contract with ACFIME, and so far, the payments have been made normally. 

Fatimata has need of this loan to purchase some ‘pagne’ cloth and clothing to sell at wholesale prices. She has customers who come stock up from her and then resell the goods retail. After her sales, Fatimata will have a profit enabling her to bolster her commerce and also to take care of her children.

loans.use: to purchase 'pagne' cloth and some children's clothing to sell

loans.name: Rina Jacqueline

texts.fr:
Agée de 22 ans, Rina Jacqueline est mariée et mère d’un enfant de 3 ans non encore scolarisé. Son mari s’adonne à des petits boulots sur ordinateur (téléchargement des chansons . . . ) .
Fabrication de craies est l'activité génératrice de revenu de Rina, elle a débuté en 2012. Les produits finis sont directement livrés auprès des clients fixes. C'est une activité qu'elle a héritée de ses parents.
Pendant la période des grandes vacances (juillet - août), la vente de craie est en réduit et elle vend des fournitures de bureau comme enveloppes, papiers vélin, carnets, etc...
La famille habite  dans une maison appartenant à ses parents, et son rêve est de pouvoir améliorer la condition de vie de la famille y compris l'acquisition d'un terrain pour y construire sa propre maison.
texts.en:
Rina Jacqueline, aged 22, is a married mother of a 3-year-old child, who is not yet in school. Her husband devotes all his time to odd jobs on the computer (downloading songs, …). Making chalk is Rina Jacqueline’s business, which she started in 2012. The finished products are delivered directly to set customers. This is a business that was passed down to her from her parents. 

During major vacation periods (July- August), chalk sales are low, and she sells office supplies, such as envelopes, vellum paper, notebooks, etc…

Her family lives in a house belonging to her parents. Her dream is to be able to improve her family’s living conditions, including acquiring a plot of land on which to build her own house.

loans.use: to purchase plaster and dyes for making chalk

loans.name: Wilfred

texts.en:
Since 1995, Wilfred has lived on and farmed his 3.5 acre farmland situated on the outskirts of Nyamira, Kenya. Since then, his family and business have grown in more ways than one. He is still married to the same woman he married in 1991 but today they have five children. When he started farming, Wilfred only had hopes and dreams. Now, the farm has two cows, 30 head of poultry, goats and rabbits, two dozen trees, tomatoes, cabbage and kale. Due to the climatic conditions of the area, his farm is also equipped with irrigation equipment. 

Wilfred is seeking a  KES 100,000 loan to:
1. Expand his horticultural farm
2. Construct a cowshed
3. Fence his farmland.

He has managed to save a bit of his own salary money from a job that he has: the loan amount will top this up to the amount required for the whole project.
 
Wilfred has always practised horticultural farming to meet commercial ends and dairy farming for subsistence. However, as the population of the country increases, farmers have had to increase their farms' milk production to more than just what was sufficient for their families. The demand for more milk drove Wilfred to acquire two high yielding dairy cows for milk production. To make the cows' environment more conducive, he is planning to construct a cowshed for them. He is also planning to fence the farmland to control animals moving onto the crop section and destroying what he has planted.
 
Your investment will mean the world to Wilfred and his family as it will push their farming business to a whole new level. With the boost will come higher living standards for them all.

loans.use: to expand his horticultural farm, construct a cowshed and fence his farmland

loans.name: Khayrinisso

texts.ru: Хайриниссо 34 лет. Она замужем и мать двоих сыновей. Сыновьям 11 и 8 лет. Дети учатся в средней школе. Муж занимается строительным мастером. Хайриниссо талантливая и активная женщина. Она у себя дома занимается шитьем женской одежды. Хайриниссо 5 лет занимается этой деятельности. Она уже опытная швея. В швейном деле ей нравится сшить национальную женскую одежду. Хайринисо хочет улучшить процесс работы, потому что ее нынешняя швейная машинка не выполняет свои функции достаточно хорошо. Она просит кредит для купли швейной машинки. Также на оставшуюся часть денег Хайриниссо ткани и швейные принадлежности. Это кредит поможет ей расширить деятельность и привлечь больше клиентов.
texts.en: Khayrinisso is 34 years old, married, and the mother of two boys, who are 11 and 8 years old.  Her children study in secondary school and her husband works as a builder.  Khayrinisso is a talented and active woman, and sews women's clothing from home.  Khayrinisso began this business 5 years ago and is already an experienced seamstress.  She enjoys sewing traditional Tajik women's clothing.  Khayrinisso wants to improve her work process - her current sewing machine does not work well enough.  She is asking for a loan to purchase a new sewing machine, but will also use part of the money to buy fabric and sewing supplies.  This loan will help her to expand her business and to get more clients.

loans.use: to purchase a sewing machine, fabric, and sewing supplies

loans.name: Aziza

texts.ru: Азиза, 42 года, замужем, у нее 4 своих детей, также у супруга от первого брака есть 4 детей. Азиза в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи занимается животноводством и полеводством, стартовав 15 лет назад. Благодаря упорному труду Азизы в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется корова, на 0,50 Га собственной и 1,0 Га арендованной земли она выращивает фасоль. Азиза в целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 80,000 сом (KGS) на покупку 16 овец для разведения. Доходы от кредита Азиза вложит в расширение бизнеса и воспитание и образование детей.
texts.en: Aziza is 42 years old and married. She has four children and her husband has an additional four children from his first marriage. As the main source of income for her family, Aziza practices livestock breeding and crop farming. She began this business 15 years ago. Thanks to Aziza's hard work, she currently has a cow on her farm as well as 0.50 hectares of her own land and 1.0 hectares of rented land on which she grows beans. For the further development of her business, Aziza turned to Microfinance Bank "Bai Tushum." She is requesting a loan for 80,000 som (KGS) to buy 16 sheep to raise. Aziza plans to invest the earnings from the loan in the expansion of her business as well as raising and educating her children.

loans.use: to purchase 16 sheep for fattening up and subsequent resale.

loans.name: Aidinhan

texts.ru: Айдинхан, 42 года, замужем, мать 4 детей, все активно помогают по хозяйству. Айдинхан занимается сельским хозяйством. На сегодня в хозяйстве есть 6 коров. На участке мерою 0,53 Га она выращивает кукурузу для реализации. Ежемесячный доход от бизнеса Айдинхан составляет до 16,000 сом (KGS). Она обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку коров. Доходы от кредита Айдинхан планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие ее бизнеса и хочет накопить средства на ремонт загона для скота.
texts.en: Aidinhan is 42 years old, married, and has 4 children, all of whom actively help around the house.  Aidinhan works in agriculture; she owns 6 cows and a 0.53 hectare plot of land, on which she raises corn to sell.  She makes up to 16,000 KGS a month from her business.  She turned to the bank "Bai-Tushum" for a loan of 100,000 KGS to purchase cows.  With the income from the loan, Aidinhan plans to invest in the further expansion of her business and also hopes to save enough money to repair a corral for her livestock.

loans.use: to buy cows and to invest in her business

loans.name: Adilet

texts.ru: Адилет, 37 лет, замужем, 3 детей, образование среднее. Адилет 14 лет назад начала заниматься животноводством и полеводством. В хозяйстве Адилет есть 4 коровы, 21 овец и коз. На земельном наделе мерою 3,0 Га она выращивает люцерну для внутрихозяйственного потребления. Ежемесячная прибыль составляет около 15,000 сом (KGS). В целях увеличения поголовья скота, она обратилась в Банк «Бай-Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 25,000 сом (KGS) на покупку овец. Доходы от бизнес деятельности Адилет будет вкладывать в дальнейшее развитие ее бизнеса.
texts.en: Adilet is 37 years old, married, and has 3 children.  She has a secondary education.  Adilet began working in animal husbandry and agriculture 14 years ago.  She now owns 4 cows, 21 sheep, and goats.  On a 3.0 hectare plot of land she raises alfalfa for consumption.  Her monthly income is about 15,000 KGS.  With the goal of increasing the size of her herd, she turned to the bank "Bai-Tushum" for a loan of 25,000 KGS to purchase sheep.  With the income from her business, Adilet will save towards its continued expansion.

loans.use: to buy additional sheep to fatten and resell

loans.name: Katooma Lucky Group

texts.en:
Florence is a 32-year-old hardworking married mother of two children, ages six and four years, living in Kamwenge, Uganda.  She has a shop and also works in a hospital as a nurse to earn a living. She is planning to expand her shop into wholesale but faces a lot of competition from the surrounding business community. 

Florence is requesting a loan to buy sugar, soap and sweets to sell.

loans.use: to buy sugar, soap and sweets to sell.

loans.name: Zhamila

texts.ru: Жамила, 52 года, замужем, образование среднее, мать 4 детей. Жамила занимается животноводством и полеводством, в хозяйстве есть 2 коровы, 10 овец. На участке 1,48 Га она выращивает фасоль для реализации, также на ежедневной основе продает молоко. Ее доход составляет около 17,000 сом (KGS). Она обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку удобрений, семян, топлива для выращивания экологичной фасоли. Доходы от кредита она направит на дальнейшее развитие ее бизнеса и покупку дополнительных земельных наделов.
texts.en: Zhamila is 52 years old, married, and the mother of 4 children.  She has a secondary education.  Zhamila works in animal husbandry and agriculture, and owns 2 cows, 10 sheep, and a 1.48 hectare plot of land, on which she raises beans for sale.  She also sells milk on a daily basis.  Her monthly income is about 17,000 KGS.  She turned to the bank "Bai-Tushum" for a loan of 50,000 KGS to purchase fertilizer, seeds, and fuel to raise organic beans.  She will use the income from the loan to further expand her business and to purchase additional land.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, fuel and seeds in order to raise organic beans

loans.name: Tikwere Group

texts.en:
Jane is 34 years old with three children. She used to be a housewife but, with the help of her previous loans, she now owns a shop in the nearby market.

Jane started this business so she could financially support her family. She wants to take out a loan in order to increase her business by buying more commodities such as beans, flour, sugar and cooking oil. 

Jane's ambition is to open a bigger shop. Since she started obtaining the loans, her achievements are that she is now able to pay her children's school fees and medical bills.

loans.use: to buy beans, flour, sugar and cooking oil

loans.name: Melisa's Group

texts.en:
Melisa, pictured above, has five children and is always described as a very hardworking individual, which is why she was selected to become the leader of her group. She is representing 13 farmers in Matete District and is happy to be working with One Acre Fund for the first time this year.

Melisa has been a farmer for 15 years and, in order to earn enough to send her children to school, decided to join the One Acre Fund program this season. Her loan will not only include farming inputs but also a solar light, which she is very happy to be getting as that means she will now reduce the consumption of paraffin fuel and therefore save more money. With the profits from this coming season, Melisa is planning to repair her home.

A total of six acres will be planted by Melisa's Group, and between them they will receive a total of 12 solar lights.

loans.use: to purchase hybrid seeds and fertilizer for the cultivation of maize, as well as a solar light.

loans.name: Agneta's Group

texts.en:
Agneta, aged 46, is married and has four children. She is often described as a very hard-working individual. As a group leader, Agneta is representing her group of 13 farmers in Matete District in Kenya, and is very excited to be working with One Acre Fund for the first time this year.

The decision to join One Acre Fund was largely a result of Agneta's desire to have access to quality training and to acquire new farming methods. In addition to receiving farming inputs, such as cost-efficient hybrid seeds and fertilizer for maize cultivation, she is purchasing a solar light as part of her loan. This is very exciting for Agneta as she will be able to reduce her family's consumption of paraffin fuel and therefore save more money. With the profits gained from this year’s harvest, she plans to invest in a business.

Agneta and her group will receive a total of seven solar lights as well as inputs of cost-efficient hybrid maize seeds and fertilizer to plant a total of 6.5 acres.

loans.use: to purchase a solar light and gain access to cost-efficient hybrid seeds and fertilizer for maize cultivation.

loans.name: John

texts.en:
John, aged 48, from Kisumu, is married and supports 10 people in his family. He operates a butcher's shop, a business he has had for the past 10 years from which he earns a monthly income of KES 27,000.

John has applied for his sixth loan with VisionFund Kenya which he will use to purchase modern weighing scales to improve his business. He will use the anticipated profit to purchase food for his family and to expand his business.

John has a dream of purchasing land and building a nice home for his family.

loans.use: to purchase modern weighing scales

loans.name: Amina

texts.en:
Amina, a 60-year-old married woman, works in hand embroidery, making beautiful patterns for the people of her community. Her designs are much in demand, and she has managed to consolidate a clientele that enables her to contribute to the expenses of her home. 

To help her continue her operations, Amina has requested a loan of 45000 PKR  to buy spools of threads in various colors along with packs of beads, sequins and stones for embellishment. This will allow her to cater to more customers consistently. She hopes to increase her income by targeting more customers. 

Amina dreams of a bright future and desires to build her own house.

loans.use: to buy spools of threads in various colors along with packs of beads, sequins and stones

loans.name: Tailakbai

texts.ru: Тайлакбай, 52 года, женат, имеет 3 детей студентов. Образование-среднее. Супруга занимается пошивом и реставрацией национальных изделий. Тайлакбай проработал 25 лет в МЧС начальником караула, сейчас на пенсии и в свободное время предоставляет услуги такси, также с 2010 года занимается сельским хозяйством - полеводством.  На участке мерою 1,0 Га арендованной земли он выращивает пшеницу для реализации. Тайлакбай обратился в Банк «Бай-Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 20,000 сом (KGS) на покупку удобрений по 1,500 сом (KGS) за один кг., планирует приобрести 17 кг. удобрений. Доходы от кредита Тайлакбай планирует вложить в аренду дополнительного земельного надела, так как хочет выращивать кукурузу.
texts.en: Tailakbai is 52 years old, married, and has three children who are students. He has a secondary education. His wife is a seamstress and restores Kyrgyz traditional crafts. Tailakbai worked for 25 years as a sergeant in the Ministry of Emergency and Natural Disaster Response. Now he is retired. In his free time, he offers his services as a taxi driver. He also has been practicing agriculture since 2010, specifically crop farming. On a 1.0 hectare plot of land, he grows wheat for sale. Tailakbai turned to Microfinance Bank "Bai Tushum" for a 20,000 som (KGS) to buy fertilizers for 1,500 som (KGS) per kilogram. He plans to buy 17 kilograms of fertilizers. Tailakbai plans to invest the earnings from the loan to rent an additional plot of land, as he wants to grow corn.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers in order to grow wheat.

loans.name: Quenia Mercedes

texts.es:
Quenia, es una mujer emprendedora de 42 años que se dedicaba a la venta de tortillas pero ahora debido a que la venta de tortilla no le generaba ingresos decidio vender productos cosméticos mediante la oferta por catálogo. Este negocio le ha permitido sacar adelante a su familia y aportar para la educación de sus 2 hijos. Su único apoyo es su esposo.

Ella solicita el crédito porque desea invertir en la compra de más productos cosméticos como: pinturas, perfumes, cremas y de esta forma obtener mejores ganancias y complacer los gustos de sus clientes mediante mercadería nueva. Sus metas son tener su propia tienda de cosméticos y comprar vitrinas para ampliar el negocio.
texts.en:
Quenia is an enterprising woman at 42 years of age. She worked selling tortillas but now as the tortillas sales were not generating enough income she decided to sell cosmetic products through catalog sales. This business has allowed her to get ahead with her family and support the education of her two children. Her only help is her husband.

She is requesting a loan as she wants to invest in more cosmetics products like nail polish, perfume and creams. By doing this she can make more money and satisfy the tastes of her clients with new merchandise. Her goal is to have her own cosmetic store and buy display cases to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more cosmetic products like nail polish, perfumes and creams.

loans.name: Benard's Group

texts.en:
Benard is 32 years old and is often described as a very hardworking individual. He has one child and is married. As a group leader, Benard is representing his group of 12 farmers in Matete District in Kenya, and is very excited to be working with One Acre Fund for the first time this year.

The decision to join One Acre Fund was largely a result of Benard's desire to have access to quality training and acquire new farming methods. Apart from receiving farming inputs, he is also purchasing a solar light as part of his loan, which is very exciting to him as he will now be able to reduce the consumption of paraffin fuel and therefore save more money. With the profits that he gains from this year’s harvest, he plans to repair his home.

Benard and his group will receive a total of 7 solar lights as well as input loans of maize and fertilizer to plant a total of 6 acres.

loans.use: to purchase a solar light and gain access to cost efficient hybrid seeds and fertilizer for maize cultivation.

loans.name: Maria Clarisa

texts.es:
María una mujer de 35 años de edad que se dedica a la venta de alimentos, típicos colombianos como lo son las panelitas, que es un dulce de caña de azúcar con un sabor exquisito, aparte vende salsas y todo estos productos son fabricados artesanalmente y muy comerciales entre los extranjeros o viajeros de otras ciudades.

Vende sus productos en una chaza que construyo, con los ingresos aporta para el sostenimiento de su familia conformada por su pareja y dos hijos menores de edad, lo lindo de esta actividad, es como se fabrican, mantener una tradición que ha trascendido muchos años y que tiene una digna representante.

María con su negocio no solo busca preservar una tradición ella quiere mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda, tener un local grande y turístico ese es su gran sueño.

Solicita un préstamo para comprar los insumos principales para realizar sus productos, coco, azúcar, panela, requiere mesas y sillas.
texts.en:
Maria is a 35 year-old woman who sells typical Colombian foods such as “panelitas”, a deliciously flavored sweet made from raw cane sugar. She also sells salsas. All of these products are artisinally produced and sell very well with foreigners or visitors from other cities.  

She sells her goods from a stall that she built. She uses the income she earns to support her family, which is made up of her partner and two young children. The nice thing about this work is the way the products are made, a tradition that extends over many years and of which she is a fine representative. 

Maria not only strives to carry on a tradition. She wants to improve the condition of her home, and she wants to have a large place of business that is attractive to tourists. This is her great dream.

She is seeking a loan to buy the main supplies with which to make her products: coconut, sugar, and "panela". She also needs tables and chairs.

loans.use: to sell panelitas (a sweet made from raw cane sugar) and salsas. She seeks the loan to buy coconut, sugar, raw cane sugar, tables and chairs.

loans.name: Maqsooda

texts.en:
Maqsooda is 33 years old, and a married woman with 5 children. She has been in the tailoring business for many years to help support her husband. She, together with her husband, manage their household while operating a business. At this time, she is working hard to continually provide income for their everyday expenses.

Now she has requested a loan of 40000 PKR to purchase more reels of thread, packs of buttons, ribbons and lace for meeting her orders on time. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community.

Maqsooda hopes to grow her business and dreams of providing a better standard of living for her family members.

loans.use: to purchase more reels of thread, packs of buttons, ribbons and lace for meeting her orders on time.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a dairy cow.

loans.name: Lukia

texts.en:
Lukia lives in Kampala, Uganda. She is married with four children, and all go to school. She has no additional members. She lives in a rented house and the family has no access to piped water or electricity. Her major monthly expenses include rent and school fees.

She sells green bananas at the market on a retail basis and has been in this business for the last seven years, working six days a week. She earns additional income from roasting maize. Seasonality and transportation are major challenges that she faces. Her goal and aspiration is to build a residential house.

She has requested a loan from MCDT SACCO to buy bunches of green bananas.

loans.use: to buy bunches of green bananas

loans.name: Campos De Rosas Group

texts.es:
El grupo¨Campos de Rosas¨ solicita su crédito en ADIM para seguir creciendo en sus negocios, y seguir aportando en la economía de su hogar. La coordinadora del grupo Ana Joaquina, de 34 años, se esfuerza para sacar a sus hijos de 12, 8 y 6 años adelantes. Ella se dedica a la compra y venta plátanos. Su esposo la ayuda con el transporte de la mercadería, y ella desea el préstamo para invertirlo en compras plátanos y  limones. Así tener variedad de productos.  
Sus otras integrantes son María del Carmen de 37 años dedicada  a la preparación de varios productos como lo son chicha, nacatamales, hielo y pan, ella invertirá su crédito en cerdos, maíz, azúcar y leña. Ángela del Carmen se dedica a la compra y venta de cosechas, ella compra cosechas de tamarindo. Así poder ofrecer variedad a su clientela y   obtener mejores ganancias.
texts.en:
The group¨"Campos de Rosas" is requesting a loan from ADIM to continue to expand their businesses and continue to help support their household economies. The coordinator of the group is Ana Joaquina who is 34 years old. She is making an effort to raise her children aged 12, 8 and 6. She buys and sells plantains. Her husband helps her transport the merchandise. She wants the loan to invest in bananas and limes. Then she will have more variety of products.

The other members are María del Carmen who is 37 years old. She works preparing a variety of products like chicha (a corn drink), nacatamales, ice and bread. She will invest her loan in buying pork, corn, sugar and wood. Ángela del Carmen works buying and selling harvests, she will buy some tamarind harvests. Then she can offer variety to her customers and make more profit.

loans.use: to buy bananas and limes.

loans.name: Mary's Group

texts.en:
Mary is 53 years old and has seven children. She has been a farmer for 20 years and is always said to be a very friendly person. Even though Mary is the only one featured in the above picture, she is actually representing her group formed by 16 farmers in Matete District, Kenya.

Mary started working alongside One Acre Fund a few years ago, in 2011, and decided to do so because she wanted to have access to quality training and acquire new farming methods. Since then, she has seen her life improve, especially in the sense that she has had a healthier life due to better nutrition ever since. This year she decided to represent her group because she wanted to be more active in her community.

Mary’s Group will receive farming inputs to plant a total of 10 acres of land. Additionally, some of the farmers in the group will be purchasing a solar light so, with this loan, the group will also receive a total of seven solar lights.

loans.use: to buy cost-efficient maize seeds and fertilizer for the coming harvesting season

loans.name: Razia

texts.en:
Razia is 55 years old and a married woman. She runs a business selling milk with her husband. She has buffaloes and cows for milk production. Her husband sells the milk in nearby areas. Razia ’s job is to look after the buffalos and collect the milk from them.

Together, both husband and wife are supporting their family. However they need to earn more income for their everyday expenditures. Therefore, Razia has requested 40000 PKR to buy one more buffalo to cater to more customers and provide a better standard of living to her family members.

loans.use: to buy one more buffalo to cater to more customers and provide a better standard of living to her family members.

loans.name: Esha

texts.en:
Esha is married and has four children, all of whom attend school. She owns a house that has electricity but no piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees.

For the past ten years, she has owned a food stall business, where her customers are neighbours and town dwellers. She faces a major challenge of fluctuations in the number of clients and so the perishable nature of goods can lead to losses.

With the KES 50,000 she wants to purchase stocks of goods like sugar, rice, maize and wheat flour,vegetables and cooking oil. She dreams of expanding her business into a modern café.

loans.use: to purchase stocks of goods like sugar, rice, maize and wheat flour, vegetables and cooking oil.

loans.name: Solomon

texts.en:
Solomon has been a farmer for a long time and knows what it takes to succeed. He is a hard worker who always says, “I eat from my sweat.” He lives in Kilibwoni, a rural village in the rich highlands of the Nandi Hills. He is happily married and has been blessed with seven angelic looking children.

He has farmed for the past 12 years and has never regretted it. His primary source of income has been milk, eggs, and crops. Most of the small-holder farmers in Kilibwoni village own approximately ¼ acre of land per household, and this has made them work extra hard to fully utilize their farms.

Solomon has been able to earn a decent and honest living by selling milk and eggs. These ventures have enabled him to send his children to school and feed his family. Solomon has planted many trees on his compound and also has Napier grass, which has high protein and is used to feed his dairy cow. This enhances his milk-selling profits.

Because of increased demand, Solomon requests a loan to buy a good quality dairy cow. Dairy farming is a very profitable venture, and he wants to take full advantage of the ready market for dairy products. Through the loan, Solomon is sure of satisfying the demand for milk in his area. He plans to add value to his milk through packaging. He also hopes to one day start manufacturing milk products such as yoghurt and cream.

Through increased profits, Solomon is sure that he will repay the loan on time and also be in a position to comfortably take care of his family. Juhudi Kilimo, through its training, has helped Solomon to save more effectively.

Solomon, with his entrepreneurial spirit, strength and tenacity, would like to continue fighting so that he can achieve his dream of owning his own business and empowering society by being a source of employment. With your help, Solomon will be able to continue farming and will succeed!

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow

loans.name: David

texts.en:
David is 52 years old and supports five family members. He has been a farmer for the last 20 years, and the business earns him a monthly income of KES 11,000. 

He has applied for his first loan of KES 25,000 from Vision Fund Kenya, with which he plans to buy a dairy cow to enable him to supply milk and meet the demands of his clients.

David will use the anticipated profit to repay the loan and expand his agricultural activities. His future hopes and dreams are to be financially stable and be a large-scale farmer.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow to enable him to supply milk and meet the demands of his clients.

loans.name: Dilbar

texts.ru: Дилбару 44 года. Она замужем и имеет троих детей. Ее муж строитель. Старшей дочке 16 лет, она не учится и дома помогает маме в хозяйстве. Сыну 7 лет, младшей дочке 6 лет. Они учатся в средней общеобразовательной школе. Дилбар дома занимается растениеводством, она выращивает овощи. На фотографии можно увидеть ее парник. Дилбар скоро соберет урожай и посадит новый. На данный момент все ее внимание зациклено строительство их дома. Муж Дилбар строить дом для их большой семьи. Он хочет, чтобы их дети жили в хороших условиях. Но их семейный бюджет истекает и не хватает для купли необходимых материалов, чтобы продолжить строительство. Дилбар сама обратилась за кредитом, потому, что МДО "Хумо" поддерживает клиентов женщин и упрощает процесс кредитования. На заемные деньги они собираются купить цемент, песок и шифер.
texts.en: Dilbar is 44, married and has three children. Her husband is a construction worker. Her oldest daughter is 16 and does not go to school, but helps her mother on the farm. Her son is 7 and her youngest daughter is 6. They both go to school. Dilbar grows vegetables at home and you can see her greenhouse in the picture. Soon she will gather the harvest and plant a new crop. All of her attention is currently taken up by the construction of their house. Dilbar’s husband is building a house for their large family. He wants their children to have good living conditions, but their family budget is strained and they do not have enough money to purchase the materials they need to continue building. Dilbar applied for a loan because MDO Humo supports women and streamlines the lending process. They will buy cement, sand and slate with the borrowed money.

loans.use: To buy cement, sand and slate to build a house.

loans.name: Josphat

texts.en:
Josphat, 26 years old, is married to Kemunto and supporting four family members. He has been operating a retail shop for the last three years, earning a monthly income of KES. 11,000. 

Josphat has applied for his first loan of KES 25,000 from Vision Fund Kenya to buy a dairy cow so as to add more stocks of products for sale to his customers after the sale of milk. He will use the anticipated profit to repay the loan and educate his children. 

Josphat's future hope and dream is to be financially stable.

loans.use: To buy a dairy cow

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a dairy cow.

loans.name: Sophia's Group

texts.en:
Sophia is 64 years old and has 12 children. She is a group leader and is representing her group formed by 16 farmers in Matete District, Kenya. 

Sophia has been farming with One Acre Fund for years now, having joined the program for the first time in 2011. This decision was largely a result of her desire to get the best quality fertilizer and hybrid seeds. Although she described her last harvest as excellent, she believes she could have a better one this year by continuing to work alongside One Acre Fund. Sophia also decided to purchase a solar light as part of her loan, which she is very excited about, as it will allow her to reduce the consumption of paraffin fuel and therefore save more money.

Obtaining this loan means that Sophia's Group will be able to receive a total of nine solar lights as well as farming inputs to plant a total of 8.75 acres.

loans.use: to purchase a solar light and gain access to cost-efficient hybrid seeds and fertilizer for maize cultivation.

loans.name: Nurchagul

texts.ru: Нурчагул, 36 лет, замужем, мать 3 детей. Образование высшее, работает учителем в школе и по совместительству оператором в аптеке. Также уже 10 лет занимается полеводством и животноводством. Благодаря упорному труду Нурчагул в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется 2,88 Га земли, на которой Нурчагул выращивает фасоль. Также в хозяйстве есть корова, 28 овец. Прибыль в среднем 15,000 сом (KGS) в месяц. Нурчагул обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку семян, минеральных и органических удобрений, часть средств направит на приобретение 10 овец для откорма. На полученные доходы от кредита Нурчагул планирует и дальше развивать ее бизнес.
